definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.chinese: 伊斯克罗斯，维罗纳亲王。

sentences.english: He was born in Verona and received early music education there.
sentences.chinese: 他出生在维罗纳和接受早期音乐教育状况。

sentences.english: I left the university in Verona and started teaching in Milan.
sentences.chinese: 我后来离开了维罗纳的那所大学转投了一所米兰高校。

sentences.english: It's in the mountains above Verona that the red limestone is quarried.
sentences.chinese: 红色的石灰石是在维罗纳城边的山上开采出来的。

sentences.english: Verona attacks, Eric scores one-handed two pointer.
sentences.chinese: 维罗纳队进攻，艾瑞克单手投中两分篮。

sentences.english: Verona attacks, Erik scores one-handed two pointer.
sentences.chinese: 维罗纳队进攻，埃里克单手投中两分篮。

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
Bruges (Dutch Brugge), medieval town in Belgium
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
